info.title: Discovery API v1(PIM api test)
info.description:
Work with assets using this API.
If update operation (create, update, delete) fails if at least one operation with items from parameters fails.

parameters.name: assetType
parameters.description: Filter by multiple asset types. Example: "assetType=Product,Component"

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Filter by asset update time (from the specified date).

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Filter by asset update time (till the specified date).

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: Attributes to return. Comma separated list. Example: "attr1,attr2".

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Multiple sign-based sort order. No sign - ascending, minus sign - descending. Example: "sort=displayName,-status"

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Multiple sign-based sort order. No sign - ascending, minus sign - descending. Example: "sort={attrinuteTypeId}". Note! "0" is reserved for keyword column sorting.

get.summary: Search in assets. Pagination inside assets array.

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Attributes to exclude from search. Comma separated list. Example: "attr1,attr2".

parameters.name: resultsPerTile
parameters.description: The amount of TOP elements in each group to return for preview (default, when not set - 3)

get.summary: Search in assets and returns assets only specified type. Pagination inside AssetsBytype array.

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Attributes to exclude from search. Comma separated list. Example: "attr1,attr2".

get.summary: Get the asset by external id.
Get the asset type by id.
Get the attribute type by id.
Get the link rule by id.

parameters.name: assetTypeIdLeft
parameters.description: The first link asset type id.

parameters.name: assetTypeIdRight
parameters.description: The second link asset type id.

get.summary: Get audits for specified table name
get.description: Returns audit entries for specified table name.

parameters.name: tableName
parameters.description: Table name to get audits for (`asset`, `link`, `asset_type`, `attribute_type`, `link_rule`)

get.summary: Get audits for specified table name and entity id
get.description: Returns audit entries for specified table name and entity id.

parameters.name: tableName
parameters.description: Table name to get audits for (`asset`, `link`, `asset_type`, `attribute_type`, `link_rule`)

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: Entity id to get audits for (id field from `tableName` table)

attributes.description: Attribute values. Array size is equal to size of attributeTypeIds array.

assetGroups.description: Array of assets grouped by type.

user.description: The user who recently updated the asset.

deleted.description: Flag that shows whether the asset deleted or not.

parentAssetId.description: Unique identifier of the Parent asset.

childAssetId.description: Unique identifier of the Child asset.

parentAssetId.description: Unique identifier of the Parent asset.

childAssetId.description: Unique identifier of the Child asset.
